function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient treatment of outside air in HVAC systems may lead to the escape of microscopic particles, including COVID-19 viruses, into treated air, posing a risk of infection.","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 and other airborne diseases within the built environment, leading to increased illness and transmission rates.","Mitigation":"Improve the efficiency of air treatment processes, enhance filtration, and redesign HVAC components to minimize the escape of microscopic particles.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV-C sterilization, and improved air circulation and ventilation strategies.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and building occupants in healthcare facilities and other built environments.","Owner":"Facility managers, HVAC engineers, public health authorities."}]}
